February is CTE Month!! Did you know that BOUSD offers 27 courses across 7 CTE pathways AND our computer science pathway now extends into elementary school!

What is CTE, you ask? Career and technical education-commonly known as career-tech ed or CTE-describes classes that are designed to prepare students for work.

We are proud to offer the following Career Pathways at Brea Olinda High School: Building Industry Technology Academy (BITA), Culinary Arts, Fashion Design, Cinematic Arts, Global Information Technology Academy (GITA), Graphic Design and Patient Care.

BITA, GITA, Cinematic Arts, Graphic Design and Patient Care are ALL pathways that are also offered at Brea Junior High, providing a direct pathway to courses offered at Brea Olinda High School.

#WeareBOUSD #CTEMonth
